attacks.name: Assurance
attacks.effect: As long as the Defending Pokémon's remaining HP is 60 or less, this attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

attacks.name: Hasty Headbutt
attacks.effect: Rampardos does 20 damage to itself. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.
